segments.text: She told me that she's got tennis practice today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Cindy told me about you in our gym class .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Do you live in this neighborhood , too ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My house is next door to yours .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , Cindy did mention you before . You're Alexander Newman .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just call me Alex . Alex and Alexander are the same thing .
segments.speaker: S1
